definition[0]: an arrangement by which a company or organization pays the cost of letters that you send to it by post
definition[1]: in Britain, an arrangement where a company or organization pays the cost of letters that are sent to it by post
example[0]: Send donations to Iona Cathedral Trust, Freepost, Edinburgh EH8 0LL.
example[1]: Simply complete the coupon below and send it to us, using the Freepost address given.
